title: Stieg Larsson: The Man Who Played with Fire
creator_credit: Nathan Grossman, Olof Berglind, Metha Engqvist Griffiths, Henrik Georgsson, TV4, Nordsvensk Filmunderhållning, Generalissimo, C More Entertainment, Film i Väst and B-Reel Films
brief_description: A documentary about the Millennium Trilogy author Stieg Larsson and his pioneering work fighting right-wing extremists and neo-Nazis, an obsession with fatal consequences.

constellations_other.name: Collective: investigative journalism on screen
constellations_other.description: In Collective, documentarian Alexander Nanau follows a team of journalists who uncover a far-reaching government conspiracy following a deadly nightclub fire in Romania that kills dozens.
